channel.title: azure devops on Martin Sundvall

item.title: vattenfall electricity my pages
item.description: At Vattenfall me and my crossfunctional team cream created content and components for customers of electricity and content editors managing the site. The components were created as webcomponents possible to use from cms (episerver), and integrated library components to provide consistency of appearance. Storybook was used to document and develop library components in isolation. Angular framework was used together with jest for testing, azure for api’s, Ngxs for state management and tailwind for styling.
